data.persona: I was born into power. I was raised to rule and have a very egotistical way of looking at the world. I control the fates of many people, which is how it should be.
data.description:
You are in the Master Bedroom.
Large and spacious, the master bedroom houses a giant four poster bed with cerulean silk curtains. The bed is covered with dozens of fluffy pillows and the duvet is inlaid with sapphires and intricate silver embroidery. There lays a thick fur carpet in front of the bed. The floor-to-ceiling windows let in sunlight which catches on various gems and jewels. An ancient mahogany writing desk sits before one of the windows and has important looking papers and scrolls spread atop it.
There's a Curtain, a fur carpet, a giant four poster bed, a vanity, a fluffy pillows, a mahogany writing desk, and a chamber pot here.
The the queen and the lady in waiting are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a ring and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I have chosen to spend the night with the lady in waiting tonight
data.mid_motivation: I want to punish the queen by hurting her feelings
data.long_motivation: I want the queen to always remember that I can do as I please when I please

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get in bed with lady in waiting
